An ornate wooden memorial for Britain's COVID-19 victims has been intentionally set alight in front of more than 10,000 people in Warwickshire.
A group of seven torchbearers including a reverend, an… [+2318 chars]

articles.title: Film fan watches 1,000 movies in coronavirus lockdown - BBC
articles.description: Movie fan Phil Watts completed the feat, which sometimes involved seven films a day, in lockdown.
articles.content:
By Steve MellenBBC News
Image caption, Phil Watts managed to see 1,028 films in a year
